resources.string: Will there be more features added?
How is this app different to other money saving apps?
Will the app be available on IOS?
How long does it take to get a response?
CashClash is a money saving application, tailored towards students at university to help manage their money by seeing in depth exactly what and where theyâ€™re spending their money.

Typical money saving applications do not target younger people, plus they normally involve opening an account or paying a fee, this is where CashClash is different. It specialises in creating complete breakdowns of your spending along with tips and vouchers on how to manage your money.
Yes, the application is going through constant development so more features will be released over time.
Targeted at students, no sign up, no contract; just easy financing.
Eventually, but for the time being its an android based application as its developed through Android Studio.
